T07vabhdicu:3149: ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /

T07vabhdicu:3154: naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāṇāṃ punaḥ śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣākārādhipatiphale /
T07vabhdicu:3158: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /

T07vabhdicu:3166: bhāvanāheyasya khalu karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmāḥ dve,

T07vabhdicu:3188: kathaṃ punaḥ pratikṣaṇabhidureṣu saṃskāreṣu parasparākṛtasaṅketeṣu satsu,

T07vabhdicu:3196: skandhasantāne tu viśiṣṭaskandhāntarotpattau satyāṃ bījajalābhiṣekādyanugrahād viśiṣṭaphalotpattivaditi /

T07vabhdicu:3231: athaitāṃ paramagambhīrāṃ duravabodhāṃ prakṛtipuruṣeśvarādikudarśanatimirotsādanakarīṃ karmasvakatāṃ kaḥ svayamabhisaṃbuddhya lokānugrahāya pradarśayatīti ? brūmaḥ /

T07vabhdicu:3247: avidyāndhaḥkāropahatabuddhinayano 'yaṃ lokaḥ sa mayā samyagdṛṣṭiprabhāvabhāsitena śīlasaṃkrameṇottārayitavyaḥ /

T07vabhdicu:3475: kasminpunaḥ kāle buddhā bhagavanto buddhādityāḥ prādurbhavanti ?

T07vabhdicu:3546: evantu varṇayanti- sannikṛṣṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthāpayitvā yatsarvasattvānāṃ bhogaiśvaryādhipatyaphalamiyadekasya puṇyasya pramāṇam //

T07vabhdicu:3561: astu tarhi karmasādhano dīyate taditi dānam /

T07vabhdicu:3586: tatra svahitāyaiva yathā pṛthagjanaḥ parinirvate bhagavati caityāya dadāti parārthameva yathā arhan saṃghāya dadāti,
T07vabhdicu:3589: nobhayārthaṃ yadarhaṃścaityāya dadāti tacca na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ bhavati kevalaṃ tu satpuruṣapraśastamārgāvasthānapradarśanārtham //

T07vabhdicu:3595: bhavati nirmatsarī muktahastaśca bhavati nirvāṇānuśaṃsaḥ satkṛtya svahastaṃ kālena
T07vabhdicu:3605: yadi vastu varṇagandharasasparśasampannaṃ bhavati tadā viśiṣyate /

T07vabhdicu:3618: yathā mātāpitroranyeṣāṃ copakāriṇāṃ ye aṭavīdurgakāntāre bhūtavyasanebhyo nistārayanti /

T07vabhdicu:3647: sūtra uktam- “sāṃcetanikasyāhaṃ karmaṇaḥ kṛtopacitasya nāpratisaṃvedyaphala vadāmi” iti /

T07vabhdicu:3679: etadapi śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahābhogatāphalaṃ mokṣaphalaṃ ca,

T07vabhdicu:3733: atha yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanāsaṃkhyeti eṣāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ ? ucyate-

T07vabhdicu:3899: atha yā imāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo dhātvākāraprakārabhedena ṣaṭtriṃśaddhā bhinnāstāsāṃ pratyekaṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ ?

T07vabhdicu:3955: atha ya ete catvāro viparyāsāḥ- “anitye nityam” evamādayaste kiṃ svabhāvāḥ ?

T07vabhdicu:3969: nanu ca sarve kleśā viparyāsāḥ viparītapravṛtatvāt ?

T07vabhdicu:4034: aho vatāhamairāvaṇaḥ syāṃ nāgarājā aho vatāhamasurendraḥ syāṃ vaimacitrādiḥ /

T07vabhdicu:4504: na tu kiñcidabhidhānamabhidheyaṃ vā pratiṣedhyātmanā śrīyata iti siddhaṃ sarvā buddhiḥ sadviṣayeti /
T07vabhdicu:4506: gośiromātramākāśadhātuveṣṭitaṃ dṛṣṭvā janiṣyate dhvastaṃ vā goviṣāṇamiti draṣṭavyam /

T07vabhdicu:4523: yadi hi santamarthaṃ śaknuyātpratiṣeddhuṃ na rājāno hastyaśvaṃ bibhṛyurna santi dasyava ityevaṃ brūyuḥ /
T07vabhdicu:4528: tasmānnaño na goviṣāṇādiḥ nāpi śaśaviṣāṇādiḥ pratiṣidhyate /

T07vabhdicu:4547: tadvattatsāmarthyeṇa bhāvinīṃ bhūtāṃ ca saṃjñāṃ rūpādiṣu devadattaghaṭalakṣaṇāṃ pratipadyata iti //
T07vabhdicu:4550: atītānāgataṃ hi mitramamitraṃ vā manasi kṛtvā harṣotpādabhayādayo 'bhyupajāyante /

T07vabhdicu:4558: '; tadyathā tamasi vidyamānasya ghaṭarūpasya svātmodbhāvanaśaktiḥ pradīpādikāraṇasāmagrīsannidhāne sati bhavati tadvaditi /
T07vabhdicu:4561: tadyathā asti vipariṇamate vardhate kṣīyate vinaśyatīti sati mukhyasattāviṣṭe kartari ete pañca bhāvavikārā bhavanti /
T07vabhdicu:4562: tadvajjāyata ityayamapi ṣaṣṭhaḥ bhāvavikāraḥ sati mukhyāviṣṭe kartari bhavitumarhatīti /
T07vabhdicu:4563: kiñca jāyamānatā sattā naśyatā nāsāmānādhikaraṇye satyananyatāpattisaṅkaradoṣaprasaṅgāt /

T07vabhdicu:4582: yathā ca na yujyate tathā pūrvamevāviṣkṛtam /

T07vabhdicu:4592: tadyathā madhuravāgdevadatta iti vāci mādhuryaguṇayuktasya guḍadravyasya madhuno vā sādharmyamabhilaṣaṇīyatā vidyate ityato vāci mādhuryaśabdaḥ prayujyate /

T07vabhdicu:4598: prāgavyapadeśyaṃ vastumātraṃ viprakṛtaṃ jāyata iti cet / na /
T07vabhdicu:4604: tadyathā dārako mukhyasattāviṣṭo mātṛkukṣerniṣkramaṇe jāyata ityucyate /

T07vabhdicu:4627: kathaṃ tarhi sa bhāvo naṣṭa ityucyate ?

T07vabhdicu:4638: na hi tatkāraṇeṣu pratyekamavasthitaṃ nāpi bhāgaśo nāpyanyatra kvacit /
T07vabhdicu:4640: yacca na kvacidasti tatkatamena svabhāvenotpatsyata iti nāsti svabhāvaḥ /
T07vabhdicu:4647: tasya tarhi hetavo vidyamānasya kamupakāraṃ kurvantīti ?

T07vabhdicu:4654: rājatvaṃ kurvantyevamanāgatasya vastunaḥ sato hetupratyayāḥ sametya lakṣaṇamātraṃ
T07vabhdicu:4661: tathā kāraṇasāmagrye sati dharmāṇāṃ kriyāsāmarthyamupajāyata iti draṣṭavyam /

T07vabhdicu:4706: anāgatasya khalu dharmasya vartamānādhvasaṃpātādantaraṅgavahiraṅgasāmagryāṅgaparigrahāt labdhasāmarthyasya dharmasya yaḥ phalākṣepastatkāritramityucyate

T07vabhdicu:4742: navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yo yaḥ prakāraḥ pūrva prahīṇastasminprahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadavalambibhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto vijñātavyaḥ //
T07vabhdicu:4746: tata eva tadvispaṣṭaṃ gamyate- amuṣminvastuni iyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata iti /

T07vabhdicu:4755: dharmasaṃgrahavijñāne vā pṛṣṭo dhātvāyatanaskandheṣu pātayitvā lakṣayet /

T07vabhdicu:4770: ekasya ca rūpāptasya bhāvanāprahātavyasya kuśalasyānāsravasya ceti /

T07vabhdicu:4785: ityevaṃ tāvat traidhātukāḥ duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyābhāvanāheyāśca dharmā uktāḥ //

T07vabhdicu:4791: rūpāvacarau nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyau pūrvavadaṣṭānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyekamālambanaṃ svanaikāyikasya cādhikasyeti navānām /
T07vabhdicu:4795: traidhātukānāṃ pañcānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ye 'ntyāstrayaḥ prakārā nirodhamārgadarśanabhāvanāheyākhyāḥ,
T07vabhdicu:4800: ārupyāptaṃ daśānāṃ tu daśānāmeva cāmalam // Abhidh-d_331 //

T07vabhdicu:4812: avyākṛtasya tu vipākajasya manobhaumasya sukhasaumanasyopekṣāsaṃprayuktasyānāsravasya ca duḥkhadharmajñānasamudayadharmajñānatatkṣāntisaṃprayuktasya vijñānasya /

T07vabhdicu:4820: catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /
T07vabhdicu:4834: tasya tu caturthadhyānabhaumasyākliṣṭasya vijñānasya kāmadhātvālambanasyoṣmagatavimokṣāpramāṇā śubhādisaṃprayuktasyopekṣopavicārasaṃyuktasya vijñānasyālambanam /
T07vabhdicu:4858: caturthe 'pi khalu mārgadarśanaheye vijñāne kāmāvacarāstrayo mārgadarśanaheyāśca sāsravālambanā rūpāvacarāḥ savatragā bhāvanāheyāśca //

T07vabhdicu:4864: rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ // Abhidh-d_336 //

T07vabhdicu:4875: tadvadeva dvitīye 'pi pañcame 'pi tathaiva ca // Abhidh-d_338 //
T07vabhdicu:4899: sve trayo duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāheyāḥ kāmāptāḥ eta eva /
T07vabhdicu:4914: ādyavattu parāvṛtte vijñāne nirdiśed budhaḥ // Abhidh-d_343 //
T07vabhdicu:4933: cakṣurindriye khalu bhāvanāheyāḥ sarvatragāścānuśayāḥ kāmāvacararūpāvacarā anuśerate /
T07vabhdicu:4934: evaṃ yāvatkāyendriye cakṣurdhātau rūpadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātau yāvadvistareṇa kāyavijñānadhātau yāvadrūpaskandhe vācyam //
T07vabhdicu:4943: cakṣurindriyālambanālambane tu vijñāne catvāro nikāyā anuśerate /
T07vabhdicu:4959: tatrāpi sarvatragasaṃprayukte cetasi asarvatragā vardhanta iti trayo bhavanti /
T07vabhdicu:4965: duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
T07vabhdicu:4966: tadgocare tu vijñāne nikāyā anuśerate // Abhidh-d_347 //
T07vabhdicu:4968: paravṛtte tu catvāraḥ kāmāptā anuśerate // Abhidh-d_348 //
T07vabhdicu:4983: tatra yathāyogaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtāvalambanāḥ,
T07vabhdicu:4986: tatpunaḥ sukhendriyālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ yasya cittasyālambanaṃ taccittaṃ sukhendriyā lambanālambanam /
T07vabhdicu:4990: tasyaiva ca dvādaśavidhasyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśana prahātavyasya /
T07vabhdicu:4992: tatrārūpyāvacarau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāśca catvāro nikāyāḥ,
T07vabhdicu:4997: manaindriye khalu sarvatraidhātukāḥ ye 'pi te nirvāṇālambanāste 'pi saṃprayogataḥ /
T07vabhdicu:5001: viśeṣo dviḥparāvṛttau vidyate 'tra na kaścana // Abhidh-d_352 //
T07vabhdicu:5004: adhunā ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ kasya cittasya samanantaraṃ kati cittānyutpadyanta ityupadiśyate /
